block.description: The flag to indicate whether the button should fill the container that it is in. Defaults to 'false'.

circle.description: The flag to indicate whether the button should be in a circular shape. Defaults to 'false'. This will only work when there's only an icon inside the button without a text.

color.description: The color for the button. Defaults to 'primary'. If a custom string used, then a css class is going to be added. The pattern is as follows: btn-customColor

type.description: Button's type atrribute with default value.
